experiences: Developed a real-time chat app with high user engagement using React.js, and fewer server errors with RESTful APIs.
Integrated WebSocket (Socket.io) for seamless real-time communication.
Deployed on a cloud platform with 99.9% uptime, ensuring 24/7 availability.
Mastered full-stack web development, including front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.js) and back-end (Node.js, Express.js).
Gained proficiency in database management with MongoDB and user authentication techniques.
Learned to deploy and manage web applications on cloud platforms, ensuring scalability and performance.
